website_summaries.verdict: This cereal dispenser looks good for home use and works  without spills.
pros: Does not take up too much space on your counter top
Can help kids get their own cereal without spilling
cons: Does not hold a large amount compared to other dispensers
You may need to refill it often

customer_reviews.title: Neat and unique way to store food
customer_reviews.text: We bought two sets of these and we love them. And by we, I especially mean our boys. They like to pretend they're at a hotel. They were a little difficult to fully assemble - the instructions aren't overly clear and I thought I was going to break them. They are easy to clean and maintain. If I move to a house with a bigger kitchen I may buy more.
customer_reviews.author: BeckieBea

customer_reviews.title: So freaking cute
customer_reviews.text: So a couple of points...1:some reviews said it took time to put together and directions were not clear... FALSE LOL... my year old assembled it in about 5 minutes.... we didnt even take the directions out of the pack. 2: they say the bowl area is small.... it is if you eat out of a tub lol but most people who use regular sized bowls are just fine lol. 3: its cute as shit and ummm totally planning on buying another for random chex mix or trail mix what ever... PS... I SAW THIS SAME EXACT SET UP AT JC PENNY FIR LIKE 150 BUCKS!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for anything heavier than Coco Puffs.
customer_reviews.text: Just bought this. The ‘arms’ that hold up the containers are not very sturdy and are leaning under the weight. I’ve included side and front view pictures. Also the clearance under the container is very small. You will not be able to get anything except a very small bowl or cup under it. I gave it three stars because it does look nice and it was easy to assemble and will probably be able to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: design problems
customer_reviews.text: pros 1)it looks good. 2) quality of the build is more than you would expect for the price cons 1) normal sized bowls dont fit under the dispenser. making it nearly impossile to use 2) the top lid doesnt have an air tight seal. This will not stop thing from getting stale This is odd considering the bottom cover does have a seal. 3) when dispensing softer cereal it seems to crush about 1/3 of the cereal being dispensed. (honey nut cheerios for example)
customer_reviews.author: Morgan M. Scruggs

customer_reviews.title: They are worth every cent you pay and more!!!
customer_reviews.text: Omgggg! So perfect! They are exactly as pictured! The white looks sleek and clean. The fit a whole bag minus ONE bowl of cereal... not the tiny air puffed bags but the big Malt-o-Meal bags. My pantry is looking amazing, I've already had 5 compliments and I just got these and hour or 2 ago! Plus c'mon, you cany beat the price! I want morrrrre! BUY THESE! YOU WILL LOVE THEM!
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: It's good in theory
customer_reviews.text: It's cheaply made and rickety. Mine was busted when I received it and was replaced. My family eats a lot of cereal when this dispenser is out, but the area is dusted with cereal all the time. It's impossible to keep clean and if the bottom lids aren't put back properly then the cereal is stale. I wouldn't buy this item again. It's good in theory, but no where near hotel quality. I do not recommend this item if you are looking to make breakfast easier.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Y McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: LIFESAVER!!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have three kids and a very small kitchen with very little cabinet/counter space!!! We used to keep our cereal boxes on top of our refrigerator, but I've been trying to de-clutter, and also come up with a solution for our kids to be able to get their own cereal in the mornings. THIS IS IT!!!! It looks great on our counter and we have very little space, so it fits just right! This has been the perfect solution to giving our kids the independence they need to get their own breakfast! It has been a lifesaver!!! Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: tenle

customer_reviews.title: Excellent & Useful Dispenser
customer_reviews.text: I first used this for dry cat food then switched to cereal. This is my second one. First lasted a long time but after a number of times in dishwasher the internal paddle wheel like dispenser deteriorated. Recommend handwashing. Also it comes with an easy to remove and replace bottom stopper. This is important to keep cereal etc fresh and from leaking out. I find it good looking on the counter, easy to use, good quality and a fair price. Mine is a dark red. It's also packed very well. Perhaps they should have a gasket for the top as they do the stopper but even in Florida summer cereal stays fresh. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: G. Martin

customer_reviews.title: A Def Must Have In Every Kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This is a def must have kitchen gadget for any home. Easy to assemble and takes less than 5 mins. Detailed and easy to read instructions although I didn't really need them. Easy to clean parts. Each container holds an entire cereal box. Easy twist knob to release cereal into the bowl. Has a lid for nozzle when not in use keeping the cereal fresh. Has a drip tray to grab loose cereal and maintain easy clean up. Price is amazing. My household is def a family of cereal eaters so I'm going to purchase another one for more cereal storage. Def recommend!!!!
customer_reviews.author: JJ Wiest

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Yes perfect for the holidays my two grand boys love it.
customer_reviews.author: Luz N Peña Nelly

customer_reviews.title: dry food dispenser.
customer_reviews.text: very simple to use dry food dispenser. i of course use it for my two brand cereals. the setup with a lil tricky. but everything worked out in the end. i would say it should take you about 5 minutes to have this set up. i would recommend washing it first though other then that it works as described. i would also recommend using cereal that isnt too large. like for example, shredded mini wheats is on the big side, so they may jam a bit when dispensing, or even break in half. something like cheerios size is best, lucky charms, berry berry kix, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn M. Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful! And great for kids
customer_reviews.text: This product is worth it & great for cereal storage, it looks elegant and is very easy to use! There are some days where my 7 year old will wake up before me & need my help reaching Cereal & when she does she make a mess. This dispenser is what I been missing!
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Fason

customer_reviews.title: Didn't even get to try it out
customer_reviews.text: It was bought used but the box cage damaged and it was broken on the bottom part of the dispense and scratched and and bent and dusty. So I returned it. Cute tho. Bigger than I expected except not much room except for a tiny bowl. I was wanting to use for more than just cereal. Plus my husband like to make a milk Shake and poor his cereal in his cup and there's not enough room for that so it worked out. Getting my money and I'm gonna try one of those you hang on the wall so there's more room and options you can use the dispenser for.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy waste of money
customer_reviews.text: The cereal gets crushed. Cereal and cereal dust falls down to the under compartment (there is a cap however) not enough room to pull cap off with bowl full of milk under it. The cereal gets tail faster than I can consume and build quality is flimsy on the stand and seems very cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Love these Versatile dispensers
customer_reviews.text: Love these! I originally bought these for cereal because our three kids eat cereal every single day. So I purchased two to give them a try and then loved them so much that I purchased another two. Our kids love them and we love that they can get their snacks on their own. We have Cinnamon Toast Crunch in two of them, goldfish crackers in one, and homemade cereal mix in the fourth one. These are winners! Well made, easy to put together, and no problems with food coming out crushed.
customer_reviews.author: Trendy Mom

customer_reviews.title: Lacks durability
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my independent little one to use for her grains and nut mix for snacks. It was easy to clean and my toddler was able to use quite well. Unfortunately a month after the purchase the product leans forward as if it will tip over. I believe it's due to a lack of support. This happened after the return policy was expired in January. I eventually purchased different despencers for the wall which is more durable and this one is just sitting empty taking up space. Very unhappy with the overall product.
customer_reviews.author: DVenezia

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!!!
customer_reviews.text: This just arrived today and I’m super impressed so far. It was soooooo easy to put together and my husband is so excited! LOL! It holds an entire small box of Cookie Crisp and an entire box of meijer brand bran flakes. I’m so excited to start using this every day. The only issue I see is that there isn’t much space between where your bowl goes and where the cereal comes out. HOWEVER! I believe this is a good thing because I’m attempting weightloss and it’s perfect portion size for me, so I don’t have to worry about the spacing.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Reihing

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect. Nice decor. Got the red, goes with my kitchen decor and matches my red TV perfect. My kids love it. Very nice display and holds almost a whole box of cereal in each side. Only thing is that it's a bit messy at times and my kids are nasty ( 8, 12 and 13 years old) so I keep having to clean up crumbs and cereal dust on the bottom and of my counter. Apart from that, I love it! Nice buy.
customer_reviews.author: MER

customer_reviews.title: WILL DEFINITELY RECOMMEND AND BUY AGAIN!!
customer_reviews.text: PACKAGE DELIVERED ON TIME! ALL PIECES INCLUDED. JUST BY LOOKING AT PRODUCT PIECES YOU CAN JUST ABOUT EYEBALL ASSEMBLY OF PRODUCT, NOT DIFFICULT TO ASSEMBLE AT ALL! CONTAINERS ARE PLASTIC, NOT A ISSUE. BE SURE NOT TO FILL WITH CEREAL OR TREAT THAT WILL WEIGH HEAVY. TO ME THIS SITS STURDY AND DOES NOT SLIDE. PRODUCT HAS DECENT AMOUNT OF WEIGHT TO IT AFTER ASSEMBLED.
customer_reviews.author: Maloni V

customer_reviews.title: Good but could be better.
customer_reviews.text: Using this for dry dog food. Works well. I only wish it was built a little better as it's a little flimsy. If you don't handle it carefully it could be easy to break. Most importantly, I wish you could adjust the amount it dispenses with each twist of the handle. Granted, the description didn't say it was adjustable for portion size, but it would be nice to have. You have to be VERY careful when turning the handle or it dumps a large portion quickly, and you have to open the top to dump some back in the canister. Overall, based on my experience, I would recommend this with the above caveats.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Love my cereal dispensers!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love! Got it today, washed with soft side of sponge and towel dried really good before putting cereal in. My daughter couldn’t wait to try so she had cereal as a snack! It looks so sleek and clean and got it for a way better price on amazon versus wayfair. It did fit a whole bag of cereal in one. The other was half a bag. See pictures! I may buy another one for rice!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mommy of Two!

customer_reviews.title: Cereal dispenser
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put together Dispense is well made as well as far as I can tell I really do like it ! And I’m sure you can use it for m&ms as well Pretty cool gadget !
customer_reviews.author: Tiff tiff

customer_reviews.title: BEST PRODUCT EVER! So easy for kids to use.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE THIS PRODUCT! I was so tired of my 9year old leaving the cereal bags open or him opening multiple boxes at once without finishing the prior open box. This has solved both those issues. Now I put the new boxes on top when the older gets low enough to fit, keeping proper rotation. And even better, EVERYTHING COMES APART EASILY TO CLEAN. It's also easy to dispense, just rotate right and then left, back and forth until you reach desired amount, then just replace the cap which goes in place easily. HIGHLY RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.author: Marie Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: cheapy feeling. hope it last
customer_reviews.text: it's made of cheap plastic so i hope it holds up. not sure it will keep my cereal fress for 35 days like it says it will but we will see. handle is plastic too so I'm hoping my husband's big hands doesn't break it. big cereals like frosted mini wheat don't work to well. it gets all crushed when coming out. but.. it is a kool device and makes my kid and husband eat cereal more instead of it just sitting on the counter in a cereal container and not being eaten.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Could be better but would buy again if needed
customer_reviews.text: This thing looks great in a kitchen. However it doesn’t necessarily hold the entire box of cereal you buy which kinda defeats the purpose of getting rid of ugly cardboard boxes. It also gets dirty really fast and needs to be cleaned often. I’d definitely buy it again though and recommend it to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: It's easy enough for a toddler to use
customer_reviews.text: The material is not heavyweight and you could easily knock it over. Luckily I have a designated place for it were toppling is not a problem. You need to turn the knob back and forth rather than full turns to avoid breaking up your cereal. It holds most standard size cereals bag per dispenser with some leftover product. My product seems to be leaning forward but still works fine, it just makes me wonder how long before it snaps. Maybe you shouldn't fill dispensers all the way if weight is the issue. Top lid is pulled straight up and the bottom cap is pulled straight down, there's no twisting involved. Dispensers lift out of the base for easy cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: Smoon

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient
customer_reviews.text: I bought these with the idea of using them for flour and sugar dispensing. A little bit of a learning curve involved. They might be meant mainly for cereal, grain, rice, etc. They do dispense the flour and sugar well and are handy for that, but it takes a little careful touch to get the right amount out. I put a bowl underneath them to catch extra (unintended) flow. Then empty it out when getting the next amount out. Think they will work well. My mom use to have similar dispensers made just for flour and sugar. Would sift out the flour as you measured it and were so handy. Trying to recreate those.
customer_reviews.author: cookie

customer_reviews.title: Not sturdy but it looks nice
customer_reviews.text: This is to store cereal but i am using it as a candy dispenser in my candy store. The portions are just right and it dispenses about 120 grans per quarter turn of runts. That is the candy i am using. The weight of the candy is pulling the unit forward although it is only quarter filled. Although it isn't desinged for what i am using it for i still think it needs to be a bit more sturdy. Overall for the price it is great and it looks nice. This one is a winner for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 2, however she’s very tall and independent for her age. I bought these so she can learn to get her own cereal and she enjoys it so much. She gets her bowl and turns the knob 5 times for the perfect serving for her, she loves it. They’re great quality, easy to clean, and I haven’t had a problem with our cereal not being fresh. It definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: kaitlin marie sotero

customer_reviews.title: Displays beautifully
customer_reviews.text: I love the design and how it beautifully displays the cereals in our kitchen. My son loves it as it dispenses cereal easily into his bowl. Perhaps one of the best purchases I have made for him. My only concern is that due to the material used to hold the container the cereal dispenser doesn’t hold heavy cereals such as Frosted Flakes. The weight of the cereal causes for the dispenser to bend forwards, we had to fill it up only half way in order for the dispenser to stay upright. Overall it holds all other cereals perfectly expect the ones that are a lot heavier.
customer_reviews.author: yessenia

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. Yes, cereal crumbs fly a bit sometimes but they do sometimes when pouring into a bowl from the box too. It does what I want and the cereal is staying fresh. I'm currently using chex cereal and next time it will be raisin bran.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Conway

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: The dispenser does its job and its easy to setup, took me like 5 minutes to have it put together. Only con is that its mostly mid-grade plastic so its lightly top heavy when filled so don't leave it where animals or kids can knock it down, but it wont do it by itself. Pros: Easy setup Easy dispensing mechanism Cheap for what it does Cons: Lightly top heavy but only if forced - will stand on its own
customer_reviews.author: chris bergmann

customer_reviews.title: Disappoint. Attracts ants.
customer_reviews.text: Tried to return, but missed the return window after a day. Though the product seems to seal the food in, I have ant crawling in one side. Not usable and will have to throw away. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth a single penny!!
customer_reviews.text: 1. Not enough clearance provided under mouth of dispenser for bowl or measuring cups or even to open the mouth’s lid. 2. Very cheap quality. The jars’ holder is flimsy. The knob is not made of steal. They are bad plastic quality simply painted silver. 3. As dispensing is not easy, it creates mess.
customer_reviews.author: Ravi Sinha

customer_reviews.title: Less cereal on the floor=happy Momma
customer_reviews.text: The rectangle post that snaps into the base should weigh more to balance this out a bit more. Not a huge deal but it’s a tad flimsy. Over all it works great and has significantly cut down on the cereal mess. I didn’t pay brookstone price so I am happy with it. You get what you pay for and these were so affordable.
customer_reviews.author: ilovekeroppi2

customer_reviews.title: It's PINK NOT WHITE
customer_reviews.text: Comes in a lovely shade of pastel pink when it's supposed to be WHITE. The space underneath the dispensers is way too short. Cannot hold anything weighty. This is really for puffy, sugary cereals with no heft to them - except good luck getting your bowl under the dispenser and back out without spilling half of it. Avoid.
customer_reviews.author: Seth

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to store my cereal and also make it easier for my kids to make their cereal in the morning. I love this dispenser. It handles portion control and it is very easy for my kids to use in the morning. It also has caps for the bottom of the dispenser to keep your cereal nice and fresh. It is very easy to clean but it also keeps the mess to a minimum to almost no mess. It is an awesome buy. I may purchase another set for snacks.
customer_reviews.author: MOMMYBEAROF3

customer_reviews.title: Love but am exchanging the one sent
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing it's just great to have ! And 25 dollars you cant beat that price! My only problem as to why I'm sending back for a different one is the bottom sides wouldn't line up or snap in 100 % so I figured just defective part and still giving 4 stars cause it's that awesome,just need it to snap in properly! I will update review when I go through process and order another one . I cant wait to get another one it's a item that I would want in my kitchen for a long long time!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: It is nice but one of them broke
customer_reviews.text: The assembly was easy even the packaged was damage. It fits in the designated space. The handles turn easily enough for my kids to use. It is made of plastic except for the rubber fins that control the dispenser. It holds a lot of cereal. I used honey bunches of oats and cocoa puffs for the first round. Unfortunately, it stops working on one of them. It stuck like something glue in there. I took out to unscrew it, but it still not working right. My kids were so sad.
customer_reviews.author: 1tvu*

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was airtight
customer_reviews.text: We loved this until we had it over a week. Because this is not airtight, our cereal quickly became moist and stale. We live in the desert but were experiencing our "monsoon" season. Anyone that lives in a humid city, beware. Also, because it is not airtight, we quickly found ants enjoying our cereal. We wanted to love this because it's fun and looks great on your counter but it definitely needs some improvement.
customer_reviews.author: N

customer_reviews.title: Finally got it!
customer_reviews.text: I always wanted one of these. I waited because I was not sure how easy it would be to clean and dispense the cereal. Finally I got it! It does not crush the cereal like I thought it would but the frosted mini wheats are the only cereal that breaks down a bit when you dispense. Around the knob when you clean cereal tends to get caught there but you can pick out. Other then that it looks very cool on my counter and easy for my little ones to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy this!
customer_reviews.text: If you are debating purchasing this - do it now. I got these so my 4 year old can get her snacks easier. We have crunch berries in one and goldfish in another. They're perfect. The plastic paddles in the spinner sections doesn't crush anything. They are great sizes. the lids to put back on when not in use are simple and effective. if they made mini versions of these for other snacks my daughter doesn't eat as much, I'd be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Aesthetically pleasing and very convenient!
customer_reviews.text: Aesthetically pleasing and very convenient to use to dispense cereals. I watched some of the videos for reviews and one thing I noticed the most is they put way too much force in closing the kids, either on top or bottom of the dispenser. Also you do not need to turn the knob too much, a little turn to the left or right will make the cereals come out easily.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It's not so easy to clean, there are small holes in the bottom of the dispenser where cereal crumbs collect along with having crevices inside the holders. It does work well though. I got tired of the kids making the cereal stale by leaving boxes open or not sealed. I also got tired of having to help them open boxes of cereal or pour cereal for them in the morning when I got ready for work. This helps them be more self-sufficient and they love using it. I would recommend using a gentle sponge on the inside of the dispenser. My husband scratched the inside of ours with a scrubbing pad.
customer_reviews.author: The Louis'

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to let the kids to their own breakfast on the weekends so I can sleep in
customer_reviews.text: After a few weeks I will say that these jitchen devices are absolutely awesome and I wish I had them before !! Here is my review lol 1) Cereal doesn't get wasted in the cupboards! 2) East to refill (for me and the kids ) 3) Keeps the mess to the minimum 4) The kids operate it easily which means I can sleep on the weekends 5) It gets refilled once both sides are empty 6) Easy to clean 7) Looks good 8) Price point is perfect Only thing I would change is the space between the bottom and were the ceral comes out of it !! Other then its perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: greg wade's loving wife who buys everything of facebook

customer_reviews.title: Great buy making cereal stay fresh
customer_reviews.text: I bought one for myself cause I always have to throw away cereal cause they get stale but this helps me make it fresh still. Cereal still crunchy! Plus I’ve got 2 kids I don’t have to worry of the cereal going everywhere. It’s also easy for them. I gave this as a Christmas present to some of my friends and they love it. They want to order too for their family member. Even their friends who saw this and relatives are also asking where they bought it. This is one of the best things I ordered in Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Reinna

customer_reviews.title: It is bigger than I expected and it works just fine. It can be slightly tricky to turn the ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this so my 6 year old could make herself breakfast while I take care of the baby, etc. It is bigger than I expected and it works just fine. It can be slightly tricky to turn the job to dispense the cereal, but not so much that it isn't convenient. She can do it without help, so I call it a success.
customer_reviews.author: tattoofox

customer_reviews.title: Great but know gets stuck sometimes
customer_reviews.text: Works great and looks good but the know to dispense the cereal on the left side gets stuck sometimes and worry that I'm going to end up breaking it. So far its not an issue that would require a return and I hope its something that's an easy fix.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Is it time to buy cereal?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to avoid the empty bags and boxes left on the counter by my children. I still deal with a bit of a mess as they turn the wheel and extra bits fall out after they pull their bowls away. However, having this on the counter reminds me when we are running low on cereal - a kind of disaster for my children - because I can see every morning how much is left. I bought two dispensers, so they have the option of four types of cereal. They love it and so do I.
customer_reviews.author: This is us

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 12 year since we only buy family size cereal and it was always spilling and getting trapped in tight spots. It has a removable stopper where the cereal dispenses to keep it fresh so air/bugs can’t get in or out. Tray is easy cleanup. It looks very elegant to add to our kitchen. We rinsed it in hot water before use and plan to dry wipe it once it’s depleted and before adding new cereal.
customer_reviews.author: The Driesslein Family

customer_reviews.title: Okay, but....
customer_reviews.text: I mix up my own custom cereal, & this looked like the perfect delivery system...well, sort of. First, if you have a cat, I can almost guarantee that it will love the smooth plastic. I wish that the construction was more sturdy, because every time I twist the knob, I hold my hand ready to catch the dispenser. The knob mechanism does definitely leak with smaller flakes, & no matter how careful I am, as soon as I unhook the circular plug at the bottom, stuff goes everywhere before I touch the knob. That said, it is useful.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth M. Goldstein

customer_reviews.title: If your considering buying this, take the plunge. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I had been considering buying this item for awhile. Every year we have an ant problem that takes awhile to get under control, so all our food items are in containers. I thought this would be fun for the kids, but was worried that ants would get into the dispensers. I am happy to announce that this product is air tight and ant proof! My daughter loves it and can use it independently. It holds 2+ regular sized boxes of cereal. It's easy to put together and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Overall this has been a good product that has been great with my kids. Only down side is there is not a lot of room to fit a bowl underneath and there tends to be a mess because of tilting a bowl to get it out from underneath. It is very light weight until it’s filled and does tend to make a much bigger mess when you have something like Frosted Flakes or special K in the container.
customer_reviews.author: Leighann R.

customer_reviews.title: Fun for kids. That’s all.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice dispenses. Pros: 1) easy to assembly, 2) easy to use for a kid, 3) looks nice in my kitchen, 4) not too expensive 5) Fun for kids Cons: 1) Can’t feet 18 oz box of cereal, only about 12 -14 2) Not enough room for plate. My daughters favorite plate can barely feet there 3) Doesn’t look sturdy. Hopefully it will serve its purpose
customer_reviews.author: svkru

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble, little hard to turn
customer_reviews.text: The handles to turn to dispense cereal is hard to turn as the cereal will get stuck, and it feels very fragile like you’ll easily break the handle if you turn too hard. So you’ll have a hard time getting a full turn to get a serving size since you may have to turn it the other way to actually dispense the cereal. I love that it came with caps for the bottom to seal the container so it keeps cereal fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Destiny M.

customer_reviews.title: Hole 🕳 in container
customer_reviews.text: Received this today wrapped in plastic with a hole 🕳 in the container. This should have been thrown away not sold. I’m glad I didn’t pay full price. I would like a refund. It also has scratches all over it. That could be over looked but not the hole. It’s not even worth sending back cause it would cost to much to return. Smh 🤦🏽‍♀️ Should of never been sold at all.
customer_reviews.author: QweenNellie

customer_reviews.title: good for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The whole family loves the convenience of this. Being careful has helped keep it in good shape but I can see how it might break. Also some of the kiddos have trouble removing the caps underneath that keep the food fresh. I suggest maybe a sliding function? If the arms that held the containers were more stable I think it could make this better, however might increase the cost of the item. So in conclusion, it’s worth the money it costs now.
customer_reviews.author: rosie

customer_reviews.title: Less boxes....happy mommy
customer_reviews.text: List of you complete control of how much cereal you are pulling out of the container to put into a pool. It keeps it sealed in an nice container so that the boxes taking up space. The kids loved the ability to get their own cereal without having to have an adult help them. Give them a sense of Independence and they love breakfast time now
customer_reviews.author: Boogjam

customer_reviews.title: Good product...
customer_reviews.text: I love this item, very convenient, pretty and organized. I was thinking of putting a piece of cling wrap under the top and bottom lid to see if it'll stay fresher that way. Since I read a review that said that cereal doesn't stay fresh long, so maybe that will work a little longer to keep it fresh. But very nice item and I am completely satisfied with it and buying more. It's worth the money. It's all lightweight plastic. And pours the cereal out just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel R. Perez

customer_reviews.title: Does Everything It's Supposed To
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two, put cereal in one and candy in the other. I had a little trouble assembling it myself, but I usually need assembly to be idiot-proof and my dad had no trouble. Other than that, like the headline says, this does everything it says it does. Not tough to clean, holds and dispenses cereal and even candy without any problems. Glad I bought two!
customer_reviews.author: T Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great but possibly a small water holding issue
customer_reviews.text: Having 6 boys, we needed something better for organization for breakfast and something easier for our younger boys to be able to help themselves without dumping the entire box of cereal on the floor and these have worked great. My 4yo twins (as well as my other 4 boys) learned quickly how to use this and now make less of a mess getting their own breakfast. The only complaint I'd have is there are openings in the little rubber wheel where water gets in when they are washed and is hard to get the water out. I can see mold/mildew possibly growing in there as it can't be dried (unless I'm missing something 🤷).
customer_reviews.author: Brian Kline

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Good quality! Extremely fast shipping! I bought these because my kids kept ripping open the cereal boxes and they were getting stale because they wouldn't close. These are great for the kids in the morning! I have them on the counter filled with 2 different kinds of cereal and the kids enjoy turning the knobs to get their cereal in the morning. Plus it stays fresh longer also. Would definitely order more of these for other things as well! Plus the little ones can be independent in getting their own cereal.
customer_reviews.author: Heather S. Henriques

customer_reviews.title: space saver & easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I use it for the dogs kibble only!! I have two small dogs so their kibble is according to there size.. One turn gives plenty for 1-dog - 2 turns = 2- dogs.. So no more over pouring, plus the lid is removable for easy refilling .. Easy to use and put together, I do fill it half way only because I don't want it to get top heavy.. Overall I'm happy with my purchase..
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Dusty Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: It does its job! Holds a bag of cereal, no problem. Some people wrote that it tilts when they fill it up with stuff....I think it depends what it is you put in it. I mean, it's made out of plastic, not metal. Get what you pay for. I have them filled with cinnamon toast crunch and corn flakes and works well. :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's an okay item, does the job
customer_reviews.text: I had bought this for a party and was going to fill it with candy, but quickly realized the candy I would have put in there would pour out way too easily. This is a great product but it is bulky and the piece that sits in the slot that holds the container up isn't as sturdy as I thought it would be. Overall you can put cereal in there or small snacks that will fit, a cover comes with these so you can close it up to keep freshness. This is pretty tall for our living space for our counter so we don't use it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Powers

customer_reviews.title: I love the idea of these and I feel with just ...
customer_reviews.text: I actually purchased these for a cereal bar for a baby shower. But I was excited to have them at home for my kids also. A few things that was discouraging: the caps that you secure on the openings wouldn't stay on. Therefore I constantly had crumbs all over my counter. Also, they didn't seem very durable. In fact in my car on the way back from the shower, they broke and cannot be used anymore. I love the idea of these and I feel with just a few tweaks they could be a bit better.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Gibbens

customer_reviews.title: Nice! I really like this item!
customer_reviews.text: Received this item today and so far, I really like it!! My kids love the concept of it and that’s really all I care about! It’s pretty sturdy and it seems like it will last a while! I tried different cereal to see what size I shouldn’t go pass. Honeycomb are too big for it, they crush and are hard to turn. Trix goes perfectly through and Cocoa Puffs go though pretty well, they are larger and get caught up a little! I’d recommend circle cereal only, but some other shapes may go through with no problems!
customer_reviews.author: S.M

customer_reviews.title: Kids love this!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my kids' cereal and they love it! It is very easy to assemble and take apart. You have control over how much you want to take, and once done with all the cereal, very easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: carolyf

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy using this device for cereal and it is very easy to clean. I have seen reviews stating that is crushes cereal, I have not had this problem with Lucky Charms, Captain Crunch, Cinnamon Toast Crunch, or Reese's puff. I don't know which mammoth sized cereal some of these people are consuming.
customer_reviews.author: justin holbrook

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: It was a little difficult to assemble. Once I added dry food to the fullest, it began tipping forward and has stayed like that. I’ve been using it for a few months now, but it’s still holding up okay. It leans forward almost as if it might break, but it didn’t break yet... However, the portions are bigger than I thought and it’s hard to control the precise amount.
customer_reviews.author: GJ

customer_reviews.title: Easy as a breeze
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old has been using it for a couple of weeks now and looks forward to the drill every morning. When the kids visually see something they are tempted to try it
customer_reviews.author: IN-Sarah

customer_reviews.title: THE PERFECT ADDITION TO MY COFFEE BAR.
customer_reviews.text: With this my coffee bar is now a breakfast bar. I love it. My kitchen area feels like being in a hotel. LOL. My kids made me buy this and I was glad they did. easy dispense. easy cleaning. easy fill up. no boxes in the pantry taking space. Each container holds an entire box of cereal even the family size one.
customer_reviews.author: Hazel Znidarcic

customer_reviews.title: We love them!
customer_reviews.text: These dispensers are the best! I got them so my 8 year old can serve himself. They're easy to use and don't crush the cereal. Freshness hasn't been an issue for us either but that could be because he goes through cereal pretty quickly. They're also very easy to clean and can hold an entire Large box of cereal. I'm considering getting more for snacks!
customer_reviews.author: KaitlynneR.

customer_reviews.title: Must buy! Now!
customer_reviews.text: My kids hate breakfast! Until now, I packed them with delicious cereals and placed bowls easy to reach... Suddenly now, the cereal is disappearing and the bowls are empty. Making easy for teens is key for them to make the effort to fill the bowls before leaving the home!!! Even tie lunch. Thanks for a great product. Cereals stay fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Lola Blessings

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Installing was simple but had to use force in assembling. Was afraid it would snap but it didn't. The crank feels fragile but a gentle turn is suffice. I like thst it only fit small bowl for portion size. Also, the younger children can get their own cereal without making a mess. I was hesitant to buy it due to a review stating that the cereal got stale however it has a a lid where the cereal comes out so it helps with keeping it fresh. My kids love it and it adds character to the kitchen. I would recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: 49.99 is 2 much the black ones are the same and are only 24
customer_reviews.text: I love it i wish the top lid was air tight im not sure if it will keep item fresh. What i am upset about is that i bought the item 4 $24 i went to order a few for christmas presents and the price had jumped 2 $49.99. Buying it for 25$ is amazing but i would of been pissed if i had spent 50.....that is way 2 much 4 this so i wont be buying some for the family
customer_reviews.author: AMANDA GARCIA

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, convenient!
customer_reviews.text: My husband eats either cereal or ice-cream every night, I thought this would be a great gift, and convenient for dispensing cereal. He loves it, except he insists that he only wants candy in it. So it currently holds m&m’s and skittles. It has the capacity to hold quite a few pounds of each, but we don’t want to risk more than 3lbs. of weight in each dispenser. The black/chrome fit nicely with our kitchen decor, and so far has received comments from anyone who has seen.
customer_reviews.author: Heather G.

customer_reviews.title: This holds a lot!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use for trail mix, and it serves it’s purpose.... however, the portion size is ridiculous, you have to barely turn the dial, otherwise the contents will fall all over the place. It seems pretty flimsy so I don’t know how long it will last. But for the price, I’m satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia M.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for company!
customer_reviews.text: We saw this at a hotel in Palm Springs Calif., and they looked amazing! We had a crowd for Thanksgiving weekend and set up a breakfast buffet, and the cereal dispensers added a classy, bed-and-breakfast touch to the weekend. A convenient way for folks to help themselves the entire weekend without needing to leave cereal boxes out to spill. It was well worth the investment!
customer_reviews.author: Benita M. Dodd

customer_reviews.title: "Identical" sets are completely different
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 "identical" white sets at the same time. They arrived at different times, which is acceptable, however they do not match at all. One set is bright white, has shiny silver on the handle, and covers that fit on the bottom of each dispenser. The second set is almost cream color, has a very dingy goldish silver handle, and no covers for the bottoms. Additionally, the brand logos on each of them are completely different. I am very disappointed as I needed them identical as they will be sitting side by side for cereal. I paid too much money for them not to match, very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap materials
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice on the pictures, and look nice in real life but one thing I don’t like about it. The materials look cheap and when I did assembly it , attached the containers to the stand, it ‘s very difficult to do it and I almost broke it. Hope they do better design , Overall, the portion size is good and stable
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Huynh

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!
customer_reviews.text: Super handy for cat food! Love the simplicity of this for my young children to be able to feed our cat with the headache of dragging out a bag and a scoop. My kids fight over who gets to fill the cat bowl every morning and it holds a 6lb bag of food with ease. It does lean forward a bit when completely full but has never tipped over and straightens up when the canisters about about half empty.
customer_reviews.author: BwHow

customer_reviews.title: Get this if you have kids, you'll thank me later
customer_reviews.text: I got this so my kids can help themselves in the morning. Works perfectly. The kids just pop the little cap off the dispenser and get what they want. They even put the little cap back on when done since it's so easy to do. Let's admit, kids usually dont pick up after themselves or put anything back lol. I'm glad I got it. It is helping them be a little more independent in the morning
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Best Montessori Snack Station
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as part of our Montessori snack station and it has been the best purchase. It’s easy to fill and easy for the kids to turn. Sometimes the paddles throw the goldfish out but the kids take them into their bowls and keep moving. It doesn’t crush the snacks since the paddles are rubber. Works great for my 2 and 4 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the kids
customer_reviews.text: Got this cereal dispenser for the kids and so they can be more independent in getting their breakfast. It disposes easily and can cap the bottom to prevent excess amounts from falling out or making the cereal stale. It has large containers to where you can empty a full box of cereal in each jar. Easy to clean and wash.
customer_reviews.author: sjsharks

customer_reviews.title: A no buy at all
customer_reviews.text: At first i had love it but after a week of use i see that with a little shake the cereal falls by its self
customer_reviews.author: Zalia

customer_reviews.title: Buy buy buy you will love love love
customer_reviews.text: Buy this! If you are in doubt ...don’t be. Love love love this. The whole family does. Guest who come over compliment this item more than any other item we have lol. Buy it! You will love it. Keep cereal and other goods fresh and it’s a fun product to use And so convenient
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina bell

customer_reviews.title: Great gadget
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 8 year old son who consistently put the bag of cereal back in the cupboard wide open. He loves it! In fact, we all do. He can go and get more cereal without reopening and closing the bag. Depending on the type, you may get an entire bag of cereal in there. It looks nice on the counter too!
customer_reviews.author: kira

customer_reviews.title: So awesome!
customer_reviews.text: The silliest and best thing I've ever purchased! I needed something for my in home office for when I get hungry and it's too busy to take a break from work. This totally saved me today! I'm so in love with it and going to probably be purchasing more for my childrens play room and a Christmas gift for a work colleague :)
customer_reviews.author: Daniella

customer_reviews.title: Just needs a little more thought and work on the design
customer_reviews.text: Like the look and concept. A little flimsy and it's top heavy and it feel like it's going to tip over. Also the turning/dispensing mechanism at the bottom crushes the cereal. Also a lot of the cereal spills out if you are not careful. Also would have been nice if the top cover screwed in instead of popping open and closed. But it looks great and I like how it has a plug at the bottom to keep bugs out. Decided to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: E. Han

customer_reviews.title: Making breakfast great again
customer_reviews.text: Love this. A word of caution. When filling the canister make sure the protection seal is on where the cereal comes out. The knobs were in an open position when I dumped the box in. Easy to clean up. Kids like it. Only holds a standard box of cereal So I f you are looking more for storage then this isn’t for you. I like the kids helping themselves!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Jones

customer_reviews.title: Makes it easy for my son to independently get his own cereal or snack
customer_reviews.text: This is great! My sim can easily make his own. Breakfast now and get his snack whenever he wants. Putting it together was simple, however the canisters do not clip in tight making it a little wobbly. Not bad enough for me to worry. Also, when rotating the handle food tends to fly out of it. Overall, it’s a great product. I can live with the couple small flaws.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle K

customer_reviews.title: Makes cereal fun
customer_reviews.text: Love the way these look. My son loves to get cereal now. The product is a little more flimsy than I thought, wish it were a little more heavy and used more metal than plastic, but for the price I think the quality is as expected. It does require a cap be placed on the bottom to keep cereal fresh, this makes sense, but when I ordered I didn't realize it had that and thought the wheel mechanism created enough of a seal to accomplish that task. Minor thing, overall love it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Dobson

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and Functional
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love these! They are both attractive and functional. The grates below the dispensers are removable to wipe clean. We even bought an extra one for a teacher gift, since she keeps Skittles in her room for the kids.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Thiele

customer_reviews.title: Great investment!!
customer_reviews.text: Being on quarantine this helps tremendously. My kids no longer rely on me to give them their cereal which I store in these things. They store an entire box of their favorite cereals. They now can make their own bowl. It was easy to put together. One of my best investments lol
customer_reviews.author: MVB

customer_reviews.title: Its Decent
customer_reviews.text: Its Very Easy To Assemble And Clean Ordered It For My Daughter So She Can Make Her Own Cereal And Leave Me Alone Lol But It Works As Expected Doesn't Crush The Cereal However Overall The Dispenser Is A Little Fimlsy No The Greatest Material But Hey It Works
customer_reviews.author: Kali L

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: I thought it would keep my cereal fresh but after 3-4 weeks my cereal lost it’s freshness. It wasn’t practical for my 8 yr old to close. I ended having to check it closed right and pick up the mess. To clean it I had to take it apart because little pieces fell in between the unit. Had to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: ZORY

customer_reviews.title: so happy with my product
customer_reviews.text: great product!!!! it was extremely easy to fully clean and set up. I've used it to despence food 3 times already since I've received it last night, and the food comes out so easy. great if you have kids no more spilling boxes full of cereal all over. each turn of the nob despence a little at a time. definitely worth the money! I love it so much
customer_reviews.author: Tara Cooley

customer_reviews.title: Need better customer service
customer_reviews.text: I wish there was a way to get ahold of the company! This is the second one I ordered. Loved the first one!! This one looks like someone spilled something all over it and it won't wash off. I already threw out the box before I noticed how messed up it was. I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: RaChel South

customer_reviews.title: Love the look and convenience.
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old granddaughter loves it. She’s very independent. She especially loves that she doesn’t have to be reminded to seal the bag and close the cereal box and put away in pantry after serving. We both love that. Looks nice on our kitchen counter.
customer_reviews.author: Joe olney

product_meta.title: Honey-Can-Do Double Cereal Dispenser with Portion Control, Red and Chrome
product_meta.description:
Color:Red| Size:4.4lbs.| Design:Food DispenserIt’s breakfast time, and you’ve a got a hunch your kids want that crunch. That’s when you dole out the bowls and tell them to serve it up with help from this Double Cereal Dispenser. The dual dispensing technology uses a soft paddle wheel that keeps flakes fluffy as they tumble down and dance into their bowls. While Jake and Emma like turning the easy-twist knob and learning how to serve themselves a standard size portion, you enjoy the removable bottom tray for easy crumb clean-up. And if it’s never a good time for cereal time in your household, use these large cereal containers to dispense nuts, legumes, and more non-cereal consumables.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Combining contemporary styling with a user-friendly design, this dual portion control dry-food dispenser can hold up to 17.5 ounces of food in each canister. It is suitable for a wide variety of dry foods such as cereal, trail mix, candy, granola to nuts, beans, rice, etc. The unit's as-needed dispensing keeps food sanitary and germ-free, while its airtight seal helps prevent food from going stale and preserves freshness for up to 45 days, which means less food wasted. This food dispenser is ideal for parents as it promotes growing independence as children learn to serve themselves or for people living a healthy or weight conscious lifestyle. To use, simply place a bowl under the spout and twist the knob. The unit's portion-control system uses a soft, flexible paddle wheel that won't crush cereal, reduces messy spills, and dispenses a measured amount with each twist--about an ounce. Kids will enjoy turning the knob and watching cereal fall perfectly into their bowls, and parents can be assured that kids won't be spilling cereal all over the kitchen counter. Other highlights include durable scratch-resistant and shatterproof construction, a removable bottom tray for quick cleanup, and an easy-to-assemble design. Dimensions: 7.5” D x 13” W x 16.3”; Dispenser Opening: 3-Inches from Platform.
feature_bullets: Holds up to 17.5 ounces per plastic cereal container
Dispense standard size portions easily; 1 ounce per twist
Preserves freshness for up to 45 days to minimize waste
Doubles as dry food dispenser for nuts, candy, granola and more
Promotes kids’ independence and healthy lifestyles
Dimensions: 7.5” L x 13” W x 16.3” H
Keeps food sanitary and germ-free; preserves freshness for up to 45 days
Portion-control system--each twist dispenses about an ounce
Scratch-resistant, shatterproof construction; made in China
Measures 7-1/2 by 13 by 16-2/7 inches; 90-day limited warranty
